Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation (useful for searching or sending messages).
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen.

Open_App_and_Create_Note.name: Open_App_and_Create_Note
Open_App_and_Create_Note.description: Open the specified app and tap the 'new note' button to create a new note.
Open_App_and_Create_Note.precondition: The app is visible on the home or app screen, and the 'new note' button is accessible within the app.

Open_App_and_Type_Note.name: Open_App_and_Type_Note
Open_App_and_Type_Note.description: Open the specified app, tap the 'new note' button, and type the provided text into the new note.
Open_App_and_Type_Note.precondition: The app is visible on the home or app screen, and the 'new note' button is accessible within the app.
